name: Shopper_mission
categories: 1:I had <h>specific item(s)</h> in-mind I had seen earlier|2:I had <h>specific departments</h> in-mind (e.g. shoes or jeans) but I did not know exactly which item I wanted|3:I was <h>browsing</h> with no item / department in-mind, BUT intending to buy something|4:I was <h>browsing</h> with no item / department in-mind, NOT intending to buy something
